Ah the so-called Elvis Home Alone extra is standing there in the background 
surprise surprise. Not a full beard here. He can then be seen elsewhere in 
this movie with very long hair and long beard sitting behind Steve and John

to mess with our heads. Hollyweird. Probably appeared in this scene all 
neat and shaven because he thought it would never make it to the final cut 
bahaha. ﻿

so frankly having it cut out for the TV version works better.
